sentences.en: Earthworms consume large amounts of soil, and produce a rich humus, perfect in texture.
sentences.cn: 蚯蚓吃下大量土壤，排出肥力丰富、物理结构理想的腐殖质。

sentences.en: Hi - rich humus, the soil of Micro.
sentences.cn: 喜富含腐殖质 、 微酸性的土壤.

sentences.en: Humus is dead, decaying organic matter. NOT inorganic fertilizer.
sentences.cn: 腐殖质是已死的 、 腐烂中的有机物质. 而不是无机肥料.

sentences.en: In ABC soil, the uppermost zone of soil , containing humus ; topsoil.
sentences.cn: 位于 上层 土和岩床之间的一层土壤.

sentences.en: Loosen soil humus zone multi - birth, and shoots the best quality.
sentences.cn: 多腐殖质的松土地带出生的, 笋质最好.

sentences.en: Particles of different kinds - including microscopic algae, other plankton and humus from surrounding land areas - are continuously deposited on lake bottoms.
sentences.cn: 不同类型的颗粒 - 包括显微藻类，其他浮游生物和周边陆地地区的腐殖质 - 不断沉积在湖底。

sentences.en: Plants grow in soil which has a dark colour . This dark soil is humus.
sentences.cn: 植物生长在黑色的土壤里, 这种黑色土壤叫腐殖上.

sentences.en: Potted requirement contains a lot ofthe training ground with humus, good drainage.
sentences.cn: 盆栽要求富含腐殖质 、 排水良好的培养土.

sentences.en: The gender is fond of the environment of warm, wet, half shade, requirement humus is rich.
sentences.cn: 性喜暖和.湿润. 半阴的环境, 要求腐殖质丰富.

sentences.en: The genetic types of shales in the area under research are of humus and mixed type.
sentences.cn: 研究区油页岩成因类型为混合型和腐殖型.

sentences.en: The lack of humus and the excessive leaching make this soil almost useless for agricultural purpose.
sentences.cn: 缺少腐殖质和过度淋滤使这种土壤对农业几乎无用.

sentences.en: The rendzina is rich in lime and has an upper humus horizon.
sentences.cn: 其富含有石灰和较高量的腐殖质.

sentences.en: The sizes of humus soil from top to down changed conversely, decreasing first and then increasing.
sentences.cn: 腐殖质层从上至下的粒径变化是先减小后增大.

sentences.en: Try bean dips, humus and other fun sauces on your vegetables.
sentences.cn: 试着将豆酱 、 腐殖品或者其他美味的调料加到蔬菜中.

sentences.en: When the humus has been formed, plants can grow well in it.
sentences.cn: 一旦腐殖土形成, 植物就可以在里面茂盛地生长了.

sentences.en: Wind and spring floods erode soils, exposing underlying layers and premiering new compositions of humus and minerals on the surface.
sentences.cn: 风沙和水灾侵蚀着土壤，暴露出地下土层，腐殖质新成分及其表面的矿物。

sentences.en: Yellow hill mud also is acidity, contain humus less.
sentences.cn: 黄山泥亦为酸性, 含腐殖质较少.

trans.tran_en: Humus is the part of soil which consists of dead plants that have begun to decay
